message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider that the value of the money decreases over time for both of us.
Alice, your initial offer wasn't in our best interests considering the inflation. I propose a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor. Let's end this quickly and both benefit.
Bob, it seems you're underestimating how inflation affects me. I'm losing value faster.  My new offer is 56/44 - let's settle before it gets any worse for both of us.
